mapper.insert: insert into account_book values( concat('ab-', seq_account_book_no.nextval), #{id}, #{detail}, #{price}, #{regDate}, #{incomeExpense}, #{payment}, #{category} )
mapper.select: select * from account_book where id = #{id} order by reg_date desc

select * from ( select nvl(income_expense, 0) as income_expense, sum(price) as total from ( select * from account_book where to_char(reg_date, 'mm') = to_char((sysdate), 'mm') ) where id = #{id} group by rollup(income_expense) )

select sum(plus_minus) from ( select case when income_expense = 'E' then price * -1 when income_expense ='I' then price * 1 end as plus_minus from ( select * from account_book where to_char(reg_date, 'mm') = to_char((sysdate), 'mm') and id = #{id} order by reg_date desc ) )
select * from account_book where id = #{id} and income_expense = #{incomeExpense} order by reg_date desc
select sum(price) as total, category from (select * from account_book where to_char(reg_date, 'mm') = to_char((sysdate), 'mm') and id = #{id} and income_expense = #{incomeExpense} ) group by category
select count(*) from account_book where id=#{id}

select monthly, nvl(sum(case when income_expense='I' then price end), 0) as income, nvl(sum(case when income_expense='E' then price end), 0) as expense from ( select to_char(reg_date,'yy-mm') as monthly, price, income_expense from account_book where id=#{id} ) group by monthly order by monthly
